1.title: Mantises
1.plot: Virgin Mantis realizes that he's sexually unfulfilled in comparison to his jock friends at school.

2.title: Seahorses
2.plot: Horace enjoys the bachelor life for as long as he can before realizing that his irresponsible choices have permanent consequences.

3.title: Penguins
3.plot: Peter Penguin plans to propose to his girlfriend, Paula, but is discouraged when he realizes the rock he picked isn't big enough. Paula, concerned with Pete's strange behaviour, seeks advice from her friends.

imdb.plot outline: An animated comedy series for adults that both educates and entertains. Through the use of anthropomorphic animals, each episode revolves around a fact that may not be common knowledge to most people, but the themes explored will feel strangely relatable to the human world we live in. Be prepared to laugh, learn, and possibly even cry as Wild Tales takes you on an adventure you had no idea you wanted to be on.
imdb.title: Wild Tales
plot: An animated comedy series for adults that both educates and entertains. Through the use of anthropomorphic animals, each episode revolves around a fact that may not be common knowledge to most people, but the themes explored will feel strangely relatable to the human world we live in. Be prepared to laugh, learn, and possibly even cry as _Wild Tales_ (qv) takes you on an adventure you had no idea you wanted to be on.
